Message:
The next day, I left on a journey
to find the sword’s master.

I’ll recognize ’em if they can
“take the sword into their hands.”

In other words, it can’t be held
by anyone except the master
or myself.

If the sword is real,
then surely the legend is too...

That means,
if I don’t find the master,
this sword’ll drain my life away...

This whole thing sucks...
I didn’t even do anything
to deserve this...!

I’ll do whatever it takes
to defy this fate...

Then, I’m gonna turn
the rest of my life into
one long vacation...!!

Just you wait, sword master.
I’m gonna find you,
chuck this sword at your face,
then go home...!
